name: Visible Algal Indications (N/P)
functionStatement: Nitrogen and phosphorus transformations feed primary production, regulate excess loads, and store or release nutrients.
descriptionMarkdown: Algae suggests no excessive nutrients vs reference, unless historically moderate (open canopy).
howToMeasureMarkdown: Visual algae; lab N/P if needed

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Thick mats and surface scum on most substrate.
Criteria: > 50% cover or nuisance mats

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Mats cover about one third to one half of riffles.
Criteria: ~30-50% cover

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Thin green filaments on stones in patches.
Criteria: ~10-30% cover

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Cobble substrate mostly clean. Thin biofilm only.
Criteria: < 10% benthic algal cover
